          <Maneuver name="Npc30_maneuver">

              <Action name="StartAutopilot">
                <PrivateAction>
                  <ActivateControllerAction longitudinal="true" />
                </PrivateAction>
              </Action>

              </StartTrigger>
            </Event>
            <Event name="StopAutopilot" priority="overwrite">

                <PrivateAction>
                  <ActivateControllerAction longitudinal="false" />

              </Action>
              <StartTrigger>
                <ConditionGroup>
                  <Condition conditionEdge="rising" delay="0.0" name="startTrigger">
                    <ByValueCondition>
                      <SimulationTimeCondition rule="greaterThan" value="100.0" />
                    </ByValueCondition>
                  </Condition>
                </ConditionGroup>
              </StartTrigger>
            </Event>
          </Maneuver>
        </ManeuverGroup>
        <StartTrigger>
          <ConditionGroup>
            <Condition conditionEdge="rising" delay="0.0" name="startTrigger">
              <ByValueCondition>
                <SimulationTimeCondition rule="greaterThan" value="0.0" />
              </ByValueCondition>
            </Condition>
          </ConditionGroup>
        </StartTrigger>
      </Act>
    </Story>
    <StopTrigger>
      <ConditionGroup>
        <Condition conditionEdge="none" delay="1.0" name="myTrigger">
          <ByValueCondition>
            <StoryboardElementStateCondition state="completeState" storyboardElementRef="mystory" storyboardElementType="story" />
          </ByValueCondition>
        </Condition>
      </ConditionGroup>
    </StopTrigger>
  </Storyboard>
</OpenScenario>
gold: Before dawn on the Flensburg (Germany) T‑1 road network (2024‑07‑11 at 02:45), conditions are cloudy with no rain falling and extremely dense fog that severely limits visibility. Two vehicles are present: the ego car starts at (12.57, 155.61, 0.0) facing heading −0.235 rad, and another vehicle is at (−5.60, 17.31, 0.0) heading −1.732 rad; there are no pedestrians. The ego’s autopilot engages immediately at simulation start (time > 0 s) and disengages at 100 s. No explicit routes or speed limits are specified.
